about_the_game:
"Steel a soul for a second chance..."

Triple the style with a whoppin' 104 tracks from the classic third installment of the Devil May Cry franchise, first released in 2005.

The 199+ minute soundtrack has been reauthored from the original, high quality source material. Formats include MP3 (V0), FLAC (16-bit), and AAC (VBR).
